documents.document: Ooh stick you, you mamma too and you daddyyyyy @RadioX #daphneandceleste #throwbackthursday 👌🏻🎧😂
Waaaahhhhh stupid work making me miss that match! 😡

My abs are sore from coughing 😭😭😭😭
This is class 😂 hat trick in the Derby pleeeeaaaasssseeee 👌🏻⚽️🏆 https://t.co/ufJ5aIme5N

@Susy412 still tesco but back in community development :) X
New job that is actually relevant to my qualifications and career face on 😁😁😁😁😁 #finally
Great that @TheSSEHydro has a bar selling unchilled drinks and the staff think it's funny when you ask for a cold one....
@onechord_js this was last year lol. Still funny tho X
Happy birthday to @scuj1 who is 34 today. Older and grumpier than he was yesterday! X
@onechord_js @nat4sha_ @Brizo0505 haha if he was 10 years younger aye! X
Shhhh be quiet you might piss somebody off, like me motherfucker you've been at it for too long! 🎧🎸👌🏻 #3sleeps #a7x
Wow! #thevoiceuk 👌🏻🎤

@onechord_js don't think we're northern tho? X
Just woke up and can't move from my bed 😭😭😭
Not even 7.30 and @LeanneLowe11 has me drinking a mixture of prosecco and gin 🙈 might no see the bells! X
Muppet movie is on and I really don't want to go to work 😭😭😭😭😭
Work, ponies, pizza and napping. Quietest Boxing Day ever!! 😴😴😴 #oldandboring
My family must be the only one in Scotland not playing speak out the past 2 days....😕
Very spoiled this Xmas...thank you so much to @onechord_js for my @EstherThePig stuff, my fave pressie 🎄🎅🏻😍🐷
Sooooo happy to have a drink in my hand, hard week! 🍾👍🏻🎅🏻
11 hour shift....here we go 😴😴😴
5am start tomorrow 😭😭
@AnnaFerguson18 we are going to the seaside!!! https://t.co/Wdnx44gxC3
Just bought a pie and a tea at the football and poured my milk over the pie instead of in the tea 🙈🙈🙈 I need a holiday!

@scuj1 yard night out X
